The sky would fall: If gravity was reversed, everything on Earth would be pulled towards the center of the planet with immense force. The sky would fall from the heavens, and the Earth would be plunged into darkness.
The oceans would drain away: The force of gravity wouldve the oceans away from the planet, leaving the Earth's surface dry and barren.
Objects would levitate: If gravity was reversed, objects would levitate in the air, making it possible to fly without wings.
Animals would adapt: Animals would have to adapt to a new way of living, as the force of gravity wouldve their habitats and food sources.
Buildings would collapse: The force of gravity wouldve buildings and other structures, causing them to collapse and fall apart.
